title: Ter-teran Usaba Muu-Muu (Fire War) (Half-day)
overview: Experience the dramatic Ter-teran Usaba Muu-Muu, a fire war ritual unique to Bali.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Ter-teran fire war ritual.

title: Ter-teran Usaba Muu-Muu & Village Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring the Ter-teran fire war ritual and village culture.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Ter-teran fire war ritual.
Tour the local village and interact with the community.
Participate in a workshop or discussion about Balinese rituals.
